sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.QueryParseAjax</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>Called by GlideFilter.js for parsing the query</description>
        <name>QueryParseAjax</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var QueryParseAjax = Class.create();

QueryParseAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
  process: function() {
      var tableName = this.getName();

      if (gs.nil(tableName)) {
          gs.log("QueryParseAjax.process() called with null table name");
          return;
      }

      var parts = tableName.split("\\.");
      var qs = new GlideQueryString(parts[0], this.getChars());
      qs.toXML(this.getRootElement());
  },

  type: "QueryParseAjax"
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2009-02-10 21:43:27</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>6224a1430a0a0bb900f4be5b076151bf</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>QueryParseAjax</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="System (glidesoft)" source="glidesoft">079c7c036d2220100acb70b3534330b0</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_6224a1430a0a0bb900f4be5b076151bf</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>pat.casey</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2009-11-11 16:49:19</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>502</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
